items.sentence: What Tom was trying to tell Mary made no sense to her.
Tom is cool, calm, and collected, even under pressure.
Tom gets very animated when he's watching rugby on TV.
Tom hummed a tune to himself as he did the washing up.
Because he was sick, Tom wasn't able to take the test.
The witness identified the thief in the police lineup.
The treaty did not ban nuclear tests under the ground.
We don't know why there's more matter than antimatter.
Tom became paralyzed after falling off his skateboard.
Do you think that Tom will ever make money doing that?
